full_threads.body:
Presenter 1: Paradise Overview, Fabia Mueller
  • 1. To understand the key innovations of Phonak's latest hearing aid platform:
    Not Satisfied
  • 2. To understand the consumer related motivations for the design of Phonak's new platform:
    Not Satisfied
  • 3. To learn of the new hearing aid models and form factors that will be available:
    Not Satisfied
Presenter 2: Audèo Paradise in detail, Peter Mulas
  • 1. To gain an understanding on Phonak's new gain and compression approach made available with its new prescription formula:
    Not Satisfied
  • 2. To gain an understanding on Phonak's new hardware components with respect to movement, localisation and environmental awareness:
    Not Satisfied
  • 3. To be able to understand the new noise reduction approaches available with Phonak's new platform:
    Not Satisfied
Presenter 3: Marketing support, Michelle Mowbray
  • 1. Review and learn of simple, easy to implement marketing strategies that hearing clinics can consider:
    Not Satisfied
  • 2. To learn how clinics and business can leverage the opportunities provided by Phonak's latest hearing instrument platform:
    Not Satisfied
Presenter 4: Well-Hearing is Well-Being, Angela Pelosi
  • 1. To gain insight with regards to Phonak's audiology thought leadership topic "Well-Hearing is Well- Being":
    Not Satisfied
  • 2. To understand the links between Phonak hearing technology features and their benefits to cognitive, social-emotional and physical well-being:
    Not Satisfied
Presenter 5: Universal Connectivity, Thilini Peiris
  • 1. To learn the basics of Bluetooth and 2.4 GHz transmission:
    Not Satisfied
  • 2. To gain an understanding of the improved Bluetooth capabilities of Phonak's latest platform:
    Not Satisfied
  • 3. To learn how to pair and connect Phonak's new devices to Bluetooth, AirStream and Roger devices:
    Not Satisfied
  • 4. To review basic troubleshooting techniques to resolve simple issues:
    Not Satisfied
Presenter 6: Sound Demonstration
  • 1. Hear examples of new features available with Phonak Paradise Platform (Dynamic Noise Cancellation and Speech Enhancer):
    Not Satisfied
  • 2. Experience music sound quality of Paradise platform for streaming and acoustic music:
    Not Satisfied
Presenter 7: Personalised Digital Solutions, Peter Mulas
  • 1. To gain an understanding on Phonak's eSolutions and how they can be used to develop a Digital Service Delivery Model:
    Not Satisfied
Overall
  • Overall, this activity has met my needs in relation to this topic:
    Not Satisfied

Hi - hope you're having a great Thursday!

My name's Kayne - I'm the Marketing Manager at Propel.

We help Australian businesses generate sales, leads and customers online.

This year our team has helped hundreds of businesses to grow their bottom line revenues by delivering them more customers.

I was on your website phonakmarketing.com.au and wanted to know if you could take on more customers as well?

If this is something of interest - are you free for a chat later today or tomorrow?

Regards,

Kayne @ Propel
